garden_planning.title: 5-D Design
garden_planning.description: Design your garden using our intuitive planning tool. Layer by layer build up your personal map. Choose from over 10.000 plants to create a colorful and abundant permaculture map, across space, time and alternatives.

why.title: Instant Feedback
why.description: Good neighbours? Crop rotation? Environmental requirements? Let the app do the work! Place your chosen plants on your individual garden and receive instant feedback for their favorite spots - without time restrictions!

community.title: Community
community.description: Connect and collaborate with other permaculturists, gardeners and friends. Share your successes, challenges or pictures. Get inspired by other beautiful beds, gardens and fields nearby you or around the world.

world: Together, we grow the PermaplanT world!
